summary: A young girl becomes possessed by a woman from a witches cult, who seeks vengeance, terror, and confusion around her family and the town folks.
cast: Julián Mateos|Marián Salgado|Fernando Sancho|Lone Fleming|Ángel del Pozo|Kali Hansa|Daniel Martín|Tota Alba|Roberto Camardiel|María Kosty|Fernando Hilbeck|Julia Saly|María Vidal|Concha Gómez Conde|Ernesto Vañes|Lucy Tiller|Paquita Trench|Montserrat Prous|Beatriz Villasante
keywords: girl in very short dress or skirt|girl in a notably short outfit|knee socks|witch|1970s
title: La endemoniada
